refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: X509_STORE_set_verify_cb() sets the verification callback of ctx to verify_cb overwriting any existing callback.
X509_STORE_set_verify_cb_func() also sets the verification callback but it is implemented as a macro.

refsection.title: NOTES
refsection.para: The verification callback from an X509_STORE is inherited by the corresponding X509_STORE_CTX structure when it is initialized. This can be used to set the verification callback when the X509_STORE_CTX is otherwise inaccessible (for example during S/MIME verification).

refsection.title: BUGS
refsection.para: The macro version of this function was the only one available before OpenSSL 1.0.0.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: X509_STORE_set_verify_cb() and X509_STORE_set_verify_cb_func() do not return a value.
